Name: Fullmetal Alchemist
Description: Based on the manga by Hiromu Arakawa, this series follows the journey of two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, as they seek the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies.

Name: Death Note
Description: Light Yagami discovers a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it. He takes on the identity of "Kira" to create a utopia free of criminals.

Name: Attack on Titan
Description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures, the story unfolds as Eren Yeager seeks revenge.

Name: One Piece
Description: Monkey D. Luffy and his diverse crew embark on a journey to find the legendary One Piece and become the Pirate King.

Name: Naruto
Description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and earning the title of Hokage, faces various challenges in his journey.

Name: Cowboy Bebop
Description: A group of bounty hunters travels through space in the year 2071, facing their pasts and dealing with various criminals.

Name: My Hero Academia
Description: In a world where nearly everyone has superpowers, Izuku Midoriya strives to become a hero despite being born without any powers.

Name: Steins;Gate
Description: Rintarou Okabe discovers a way to send messages to the past, leading to a series of events that could change the course of time.

Name: Dragon Ball Z
Description: The adventures of Goku and his friends as they defend Earth from powerful foes and seek the magical Dragon Balls.

Name: Sword Art Online
Description: Players get trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG, and the only way to escape is to clear the game without dying.

Name: Hunter x Hunter
Description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter to find his missing father and uncover the mysteries of the world.

Name: Demon Slayer
Description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and save his demon-turned sister.

Name: Neon Genesis Evangelion
Description: In a post-apocalyptic world, teenagers pilot giant mechs to protect Earth from mysterious beings known as Angels.

Name: One Punch Man
Description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, seeks meaning in his hero life.

Name: Code Geass
Description: Lelouch vi Britannia gains a mysterious power and leads a rebellion against the oppressive Britannian Empire.

Name: Your Lie in April
Description: A piano prodigy, Kousei Arima, finds new inspiration for music through the free-spirited violinist, Kaori Miyazono.

Name: Mob Psycho 100
Description: Shigeo Kageyama, nicknamed 'Mob,' possesses powerful psychic abilities but seeks a normal life while navigating the challenges of adolescence.

Name: Death Parade
Description: In the afterlife, souls are judged through various games, and the outcomes determine their fate.

Name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
Description: Follows the adventures of the Joestar family across generations as they battle supernatural threats.

Name: Tokyo Ghoul
Description: Kaneki, a college student turned half-ghoul, navigates the dangerous world of ghouls and humans.
